p: The proportion of influenza hospitalizations with ICU admission was higher in age‐group 40‐79 years (19%) compared to other age‐groups, particularly ≥80 years (6%). Few variations in the proportion of ICU admissions were observed within each age‐group across the seasons. In all age‐groups, this proportion was slightly higher in 2013‐2014 and lower in 2016‐2017 (Table 2).
